data.name: Monopoly
data.description:
最新版本:  1.1.5
更新时间:  2020-05-14 16:54:03 (北京时间)

Hi Monopoly Players, we’ve got some exciting new features for you!
- We added a chat feature so now you can check in on how the other players are doing when you bankrupt them.
- We added a brand-new custom rule for you to play with: All players start with a random assortment of properties.
- We added new dice controls: you can now swipe to roll the dice.
- We made the multiplayer game more stable and fixed issues with the passcodes.

data.name: Procreate Pocket
data.description:
最新版本:  3.0.7
更新时间:  2020-05-15 17:28:39 (北京时间)

Procreate Pocket 3.0.7 gives you full compatibility support for the iPhone SE 2020, and a fix for palettes imported from Procreate 5.

There's also loads of goodies for you on our instagram channel. We're giving away artist-created coloring pages, skill-boosting live streams, and entries for the 2020 Art Prize open May 20!

data.name: Plague Inc.
data.description:
最新版本:  1.17.4
更新时间:  2020-02-27 01:34:57 (北京时间)

Mutation 17 - The Fake News update

From wild conspiracy theories to election campaign mudslinging, we now live in a post-fact world where falsehoods and misinformation can spread just like a disease.

With help from professional fact checking organisations like ‘Full Fact’ in the UK and ‘Politifact’ in the USA - we’ve designed a radically different scenario which lets you create your very own Fake News story and deceive the world with it.

Choose your type of misinformation, decide a motive and then select who started it and who gets the blame then use a variety of modern tools and psychological tricks to go viral!

Check out www.fullfact.org and www.politifact.com to find and expose bad information.

Hotfix 1.17.2 - Localised the Fake News government actions and fixed a few bugs
Hotfix 1.17.3 - Fixed pie chart image and rare crash in Portuguese
Hotfix 1.17.4 - Small core simulation tweaks

data.name: Geometry Dash
data.description:
最新版本:  2.11
更新时间:  2017-11-17 02:43:46 (北京时间)

Update 2.1.1 is here!

This update will function like a smaller "pre-update" before Update 2.2. Lots of fun stuff planned :)

- iPhone X support!
- New icons and effects!
- New community shop!
- Weekly Demon challenge!
- Folders and level sorting!
- New demon chests!
- Level leaderboards!
- Random other fun stuff.
- Lots of bugfixes and tweaks.

- There was an item duplication bug in version 2.1 that gave users extra rewards. This has been fixed in 2.11 and those rewards have been removed. So if you lose shards/diamonds etc after loading 2.11 its because they were bugged. Sorry :/

/RubRub

data.name: Clue: The Classic Mystery Game
data.description:
最新版本:  2.6.8
更新时间:  2020-05-18 16:38:30 (北京时间)

Are you ready to be a consulting detective? 

We’re celebrating International Sherlock Holmes Day by making the Sherlock theme in Clue free for a limited time - until May 25th!

Investigate Victorian London, featuring the iconic 221B Baker Street, Hyde Park, the Docks, Printing Press and more rooms to explore. The theme is comprised of the iconic characters from Sherlock Holmes’ story: Sherlock Holmes, Dr Watson, Irene Adler, and Professor Moriarty. Additionally, you can play as Miss Scarlett the Suffragette, Constable Plum, Rusty, Peacock as an organ grinder, and Peach as the nurse!

In Victorian London, all the suspects have been rounded up and it's time to let the game begin. Who do you think was responsible for Dr Black's demise? Grab your cluesheet and solve the mystery faster than Sherlock would!

Limited time offer! Available only until May 25th  - download the theme for FREE!

data.name: ACNH Travel Guide
data.description:
最新版本:  2020.7.1
更新时间:  2020-05-17 01:40:26 (北京时间)

Thank you all for sharing your ideas, suggestions, and feedback! This update brings several new features:

- Turnip Price Tracker
Track and visualize your turnip prices throughout the week. Spot trends and know when to sell. You'll be a bell-ionaire in no-time!

- Share Lists
All lists can now be exported and shared with others. You can optionally include only items with a checkmark, or items from one specific group.

- Nook Miles Islands
See all the destinations where your Nook Miles tickets can take you, including what makes them special and their rarity.

There are several other smaller improvements to the app as well:
- It is now possible to reorder the cards on the Home tab
- Added collectable photos and posters to Villagers
- C.J.'s and Flick's models are now in their own section
- Search now also searches through item attributes, such as source and style
- Group DIY Recipes by source
- Added a task for visiting K.K.'s concert on Saturday
- Added hobby and favorite song of Villagers
- Clothing items now list in which season you can buy them
- Quick shortcuts to the app when you long press on the app icon
- Group Clothing by season (2020.7.1)

If you like the app, please help spread the word by telling other AC players about it, or by leaving a rating in the App Store. Thanks!

Jeffrey

data.name: Bloons TD 5
data.description:
最新版本:  3.25
更新时间:  2020-05-14 18:57:09 (北京时间)

The Bloons are not messing around on this one! A map so tough, so brutal, it can only be called EXTREME! For the first time ever, we're adding an all new Extreme difficulty map: Toxic Waste. Four incredibly short paths that only the most skilled monkeys will be able to defend. Luckily, it takes more than some off-color water to scare your subs and buccaneers. And lets face it, you're going to need all the help you can get!

In this update we vastly improved external keyboard and trackpad support on iOS 13.4.

We also added some nice features to the left side menu. Now you can:
• Reorder the food categories to whatever order you want

data.description:
最新版本:  1.4
更新时间:  2019-05-04 06:51:51 (北京时间)

Our new Chatbot feature designed to help customers answer the most commonly asked questions - with improved support to help get you a result faster. We'll be improving this over time and coming releases of the app. Any issues please do read the FAQ or contact support via the app. We're happy to help :)

data.name: Rebel Inc.
data.description:
最新版本:  1.4.7
更新时间:  2020-03-24 19:29:33 (北京时间)

Rebel Inc. Update 4 - The Azure Dam expansion
New map: Azure Dam - Rebuild a vast dam to prevent catastrophic floods and ensure stability in this arid region. Protect vulnerable supply convoys en route to the dam site, but beware - Insurgents forces will launch aggressive raids to destroy them!

New Governor: Development Director - This skilled micromanager deploys civilian experts to prioritise zones for development and rapidly stabilise key parts of the region. High performance. Delivered...

All new civilian ‘concerns’ mechanic - Wondering how to best win hearts and minds? Now you can gather intel on zones to discover if civilians need specific initiatives. Strategise and stabilise on a whole new level!

Numerous balance tweaks, fixes and improvements including further AI enhancements.

As for the future, we’ve got a whole bunch more ideas for new maps, governors and more still to come. Let us know what you would most like to see!

James
1.4.1 - New content automatically unlocks if previously bought
1.4.2 - Fixed region zoom issue
1.4.3 - Tweaks to game balance on lower difficulties
1.4.5 - Fixed Warlord unlock bug, fixed Insurgent fleeing bug, improved Garrison placement AI
1.4.6 - Added Turkish language support
1.4.7 - Added Pashto and Dari language support

data.name: Notability
data.description:
最新版本:  9.3.5
更新时间:  2020-05-21 09:44:34 (北京时间)

*** What's New in 9.3.5 ***
• Fixed an issue where the toolbar could become unresponsive
• Fixed a potential crash when dismissing a tooltip
• Fixed an issue where zooming could cause the note contents to disappear

***What’s new in Notability 9.3***
Presentation Mode: 
• Present a note to an external display in full screen without toolbars and menus
• Note will crop to the external display aspect ratio so you know what’s being presented
• Laser Pointer 
• Use Multi-Note to view a secondary note that stays hidden from the audience while presenting  

Single Page Mode: 
• Flip through a note horizontally one page at a time 
• Works well with Presentation Mode, so pages feel like slides 

Other fixes: 
• Larger page up/down arrows
• Zoom Box can now be enabled with a finger tap while using Apple Pencil

data.name: RollerCoaster Tycoon® Classic
data.description:
最新版本:  1.1.9
更新时间:  2017-12-20 10:47:35 (北京时间)

Hope you're all enjoying the game and it's brought back many great memories of this all-time classic!

This update contains:

- Dutch language added
- Various fixes throughout to improve game performance

For discussion and information, try the official forums at: https://forum.rollercoastertycoon.com/forumdisplay.php?58-RollerCoaster-Tycoon-Classic

Please update your reviews and thanks for your continued support! Enjoy the game!
